div.p: IN THE BODY OF A WOMAN.
VERY YOUNG AT THE TIME, JIM.
I LOVE THE LIFE HE LED,
TO TAKE YOU OFF THE CASE
IF DR. COLEMAN WANTS TO ASSUME
IN THE BODY OF JANICE LESTER.
ON THE COURSE SET FOR IT
Kirk's voice: AT LAST I ATTAINED
AND A LIFE MAY BE SAVED.
IN MY ORDER TO REMOVE YOU
AND I'M ASKING YOU TO REPORT
BE THE JUDGE OF MY MOTIVES.
HE WAS TAKEN OFF YOUR CASE
I HAVE LOST TRACK OF TIME.
WELL, FIRST WE HAVE TO LET YOU
BE ABLE TO GET TO HIM.
SO FAR, ALL WE HAVE TO
FORGOTTEN LONG AGO ON CAMUS II.
IT IS THE TRUTH I'M SPEAKING.
MORE THAN THAT TO GO ON.
THE CAPTAIN IS IN THE BEST
I'M GOING TO HAVE TO ASK YOU
I'LL TRY NOT TO UPSET YOU.
HAVE YOU EVER HEARD OF A CASE
ALL OF US ON CAMUS II
I OWE HER FROM THE PAST.
SPOCK ON TAPE: YOU DO NOT BELONG
TO BE FOLLOWED BY A VOTE.
THE VOTE IN A FEW MINUTES.
THAT MEANS TWO VOTES TO ONE
ARE YOU READY FOR THE VOTE?
ARE YOU READY FOR THE VOTE?
EVEN IF HE WERE GOING MAD.
DOES IT MAKE WHO HE IS?
I WAS UP ON THE BRIDGE.
EACH ONE OF US MUST BE READY
FOR A MOMENT, I FOUND MYSELF
